snippet.title: 4X Roguelite Fossilpunk - Official Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Fossilpunk brings a genre mash-up that you don’t see every day. Developed by the indie studio Ahsaurus, this roguelite strategy imagines a world where the dinosaurs never went extinct.When I say it's a unique genre blend, I mean it. While it’s technically a roguelite, Fossil Punk is, at its core, a 4X strategy game set on small, tactical maps reminiscent of Into the Breach. But don’t let the map size fool you—this game still features everything you'd expect from a full-fledged 4X: tech trees, unit production, espionage, and even religion (yes, the dinosaurs have their own faiths).
#turnbased #Fossilpunk #strategy
